name: gulp
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ I or T ] to eat or drink food or liquid quickly by swallowing it in large amounts, or to make a swallowing movement because of fear, surprise, or excitement: gulp something down She gulped down her drink and made a hasty exit. When it was his turn to dive, he gulped and stepped up onto the diving board.
